title: Coming Soon: The ‘Pacific Standard’ Oral History of the 1969 Santa Barbara Oil Spill
author: Pacific Standard

sentences.3407: Coming Soon: The ‘Pacific Standard’ Oral History of the 1969 Santa Barbara Oil Spill

sentences.5bb4: We explore the effects of the disastrous spill and how it fueled the United States’ modern environmental movement.

content: Coming Soon: The ‘Pacific Standard’ Oral History of the 1969 Santa Barbara Oil Spill We explore the effects of the disastrous spill and how it fueled the United States’ modern environmental movement.
